definitions.definition: The eve of All Hallows' Day ; October 31st; celebrated (mostly in English-speaking countries) by children going door-to-door in costume and soliciting candy with menaces .
examples: They all get dressed up in scary costumes at Halloween .

main_definition: The eve of All Hallows' Day ; October 31st; celebrated (mostly in English-speaking countries) by children going door-to-door in costume and soliciting candy with menaces .
